Description:
Required Skills to be successful:1.- Customer management.2.- Knowledge and working background in SAP system.3.- Good communication skills.4.- Supervisory experience.  About the Team:Reporting to the Aftersales Manager and will closely with the Workshop team. What equips you for the role:Diploma or Bachelor of Automobile /Mechanical Engineering.
3 to 5 years overall experience with automobile dealership - Out of which a minimum 3 years in Service Dept. as a Service Advisor.
Strong background in vehicle technical knowledge.Job Details
